get by.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to have enough money to buy the things you need, but no more
get by.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I donâ€™t earn a huge salary, but we get by.
Sometimes they had to get by on very little.
get by.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to manage to deal with a difficult situation, using whatever money, equipment etc you have
get by.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The Fed made several changes designed to make it easier for banks to get by on fewer reserves.
In Microsoft Windows, you can get by with just 2 megabytes of memory.
